reviews.review: Don't buy this game as a game to relax after work. It's fun at the lower ranks but the amount of sweaty players at high ranks absolutely kill my enjoyment. Some of the most toxic people I have ever played against in any video game, period.
Love playing this game with friend!
its fun to play with friend and make more friend from around the world

Muito bom. Eu joguei muito pouco esse jogo, afinal por algum motivo eu não conseguia jogar ele, dava algum problema, mas as poucas horas que joguei valeram muito a pena! O jogo é muito bom e frenético, e se você jogar com os amigos fica mais legal ainda.

Asthetics are really cool, but some of the other stuff is kinda cheesy. The gameplay for survivor is VERY dull if you don't play with friends, and killer is almost always very fun. Playing survivor and just holding the left mouse button down for 90 seconds isn't very interactive. Overall, 8/10.

If it were any day before today I'd say new players should stick away because of the grind and lack of new player accessibility, but now I say go for it. The perk changes has made for a less infuriating meta overall (minus arguably thanatophobia or [i]maybe[/i] new dead hard specifically on aim killers- since the endurance lets them get away with a few specific clutches that they wouldn't have beforehand- but even then it's a huge step up from anything we've had in the past) and the grind has been reduced considerably. Also I got a charm for my favourite perk the same time it was majorly buffed (botany knowledge).
High highs and low lows from this one, lots to learn and very high skill ceilings for most mechanics. Definitely recommend it if its on sale.

Lo único que no me gusta es que no me puedo safar del gancho, jajajaj, pero por lo demás excelente, es lo primero que juego después de año que no lo hacía y es bastante adictivo, la adrenalina desde el inicio cuando se escucha el latido ♥

Rollercoaster of emotions, a love-hate relationship is all i can say about this game. The community can be too toxic and too wholesome at the same time, I really don't know man. Buy it if you want to really understand what i mean. I'm giving a thumbs up just because I think it would be unfair to not give it. Playing killer is fun though.

Edit: Ok i changed my mind, i am not giving a thumbs up anymore because it doesn't deserve it.
Best scare I've had in years. Been playing for a long time on PS4 now I dabble on steam too.
el juego esta nashe y con amigos mas

Simulador de Lobby, mantente durante freneticas horas llenas de aguardar y hacer tiempo, en las cuales podras hacer cosas como mover a tu personaje de izquierda a derecha mientras esperas, esperas y esperas, que cargue el juego, cumple su objetivo claramente, ademas de vez en cuando esta ese extraño minijuego e reparar generadores y escapar del asesino el cual tiene el potencial de ser un juegazo por si solo, pero no lo es, es solo un agregado, quitando eso XD el juegito

I'm fully addicted to this game, the more you play it the more you'll want to progress and boy let me tell you, there's a lot of progression opportunity in this game. If you like thrill and strategy this is the game for you!

Türkçe dil desteği var. Katil oynaması ayrı zevkli, kurban oynaması ayrı zevkli. 5 kişi arkadaş grubunuz varsa kaçırmayın alın derim. Normal fiyatıda uygun ama indirimde almak daha mantıklı. 5  kişi olmasanız bile başkaları ile beraber oynamak bile keyifli. Uzun lafın kısası indirimde ise veya kararsız kaldıysanız atın sepete pişman olmazsınız.

Pecková hra , akorád mě sere že ti killeři stolkují Hook... je to tak časté... že za celej den máte tak cca 2-4 hry normální... Killer co campí Hook... nebo chodí jen po jednom hráči a furt ho věší... dokud neumře... tak se to nedá hrát... a převážně to vypínám nasranej... tak že kvůli těmto kreténským killerům je jeden mínusovej bot... další mínusovej bot... je ten že jak mile si nesložíte partu přeživších... tak se málo kdy dočkáte že ostatní budou spolupracovat... tudíš jste závislí samy na sobě... i když je to skupinová hra... někteří serou na všechny... tak že vás nechaj na Hooku dokuď neumřete... Kdybych to měl schnout tak tuhle hru doporučuji s tím že musíte počítat že buď narazíte na camp killera nebo hrajete ,, bez " spoluhráčů :) za mě jinak 9/10 ( jen díky té komunitě... )
its a really fun game to play

I have spent multiple nights going to sleep either crying or with a debilitating migraine because of this game. I've played it for the past five years, played every killer, used every perk and I hate it. I hate myself for playing it so much. Losing a loved one cant equate to the amount of emotional trauma I've gotten from this game. So long story short.... Its a great game you should play it! ;)
